> WarMachine stumbles back as shots hit him, returning fire at
> Shokaract and Surge, several dozen laser shots and a few missiles
> flying at the two.

(Yeesh) Shokaract retreated, as he did, the shots missed him by a few
inches. Serge was hit in the back, but his instincts did not kick in and
instead he kept running...
